column5: can anyone give some insight on some good lakes to shore fish from? any help would be awesome. lol... and please dont tell me to type something into the search bar. thanks guys.
I've heard Lake Ontario holds some fish, and it has lots of shoreline.    sorry, I can't help I've never fished in the GTA.

you're right... i wouldnt bother fishing lake o shoreline. mutated, ugly, small, hard to catch.  i'd avoid it like the plague  check the local conservation authoritys website, the guide to eating sportfish will give you an idea of whats in a given lake, if you can find one local to you on a map.
Shore spots that have water hold fish
Google Maps and its Satellite view works wonders...
